tool_description:
Discover if a given text have a positive or negative sentiment. This API is exclusive for Portuguese language.

- Analyze product reviews
- Analyze social media and news contents
- Use this API for implementations in other programming languages
name: Portuguese Sentiment Analysis
title: Portuguese Sentiment Analysis

api_list.name: sentiment
api_list.description: Portuguese sentiment analysis, given a text returns positive or negative.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://portuguese-sentiment-analysis.p.rapidapi.com/sentiment"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "portuguese-sentiment-analysis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://portuguese-sentiment-analysis.p.rapidapi.com/sentiment"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "portuguese-sentiment-analysis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
